Uses of Folder in change
 

Fields in change declared as Folder
 Folder Change.changedFolder
          If a folder is created or removed only one change object is made (there are no change objects created for each file in the removed folder)
 

Uses of Folder in filesystem
 

Fields in filesystem with type parameters of type Folder
 List<Folder> Folder.subfolders
          The list of folders inside it.
 

Methods in filesystem with parameters of type Folder
protected abstract  void FilesystemListener.informChange(Folder folder)
          Informs the filesystemService about a folder change (creation, removal)
abstract  void FilesystemService.newChange(Folder folder)
          Informs the FilesystemService about a folder change that occurred.
